sentences.en: Even the too-near table of boisterous boys contributes to its euphony.
sentences.cn: 连近旁谈笑的年轻人也贡献出了悦耳之声。

sentences.en: Such euphony is hard to resist.
sentences.cn: 如此的悦耳之声令人难以抵抗.

sentences.en: Therefore, I always think that poetry is forever the best euphony in high pitch in the deep of human soul.
sentences.cn: 因此，我常以为：诗歌永远是人类心灵深处最悦耳的高音。

words.tran_cn: 悦耳的，语调好的；音调上的
悦耳之音；悦耳；和谐的声音

trans.tran_cn: 声音（尤指语音的）和谐，谐音
